StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
•  Dynamic & technically competent professional with domain expertise as a Functional
Consultant/Business Analyst in the Risk Management, Investment Banking, Retail Banking, Retail
Lending, Retail e-Banking and Multi - Channel Solutioning domains.
•  Academically brilliant with a Post Graduate Diploma in Management, specialization in Finance
and Marketing. Currently spearheading JP Morgan as an Associate in the Investment Banking
domain.
•  Adept at providing expertise in preparing functional and system requirement specific documents
for enhancing the product.
•  Analytical, logical & detail-oriented mind, with a strong knowledge-base & an exceptional
diagnostic & problem-solving ability in congruence with superb communication.
•  Good interpersonal & leadership traits coupled with proven abilities to analyse, multi-task &
adapt, handle tasks under high-pressure environment.

•   Prepared a project covering all the fundamental aspects relating to investment in mutual funds
•   Built and strengthened relationships with distributors and helped to tackle the problems faced by
them
•   Analyzed various funds and measured their risk by computing beta, Sharpe ratio and Treynor
ratio

Projects:
•  Presented a Seminar on Reverse Mortgage: An Option for Senior Citizens

PositionHistory.Title: Lead Business Analyst - Risk Management
PositionHistory.Description:
Job Responsibilities
•   Working on Agile technology in a Scrum environment
•   Worked onsite at client location in Denmark
•   Market study, current system study, gap analysis
•   Analysis of roadmap items, feasibility analysis and preparation of proof of concept (POC)
•   Requirement gathering and requirement analysis
•   Authoring functional and system requirement specification documents
•   Handling change requests
•   Interaction with the clients and the technical team
•   Handling internal supplier agreements with the data warehouse team
•   Imparting domain related training and presentations to the technical team
•   Training and handholding new team members
•   Interviewing prospective candidates


Projects
•   Risk Management
a)  Basel Compliance
b)  Credit risk - Standardized, Foundation IRB and Advanced IRB approaches
c)  Probability of Default, Loss given default, Exposure at default and Maturity
d)  Market risk - Standardized and Internal Models Approach
e)  Operational risk - Basic Indicator, Standardized and Advanced Measurement
approaches
f)  Stress testing, backtesting
g)  Automatic Limits (Pre-Approved Limits)
h)  Shadow Limits
i)  Portfolio Loan Concept
j)  Facility Pricing Tool
k)  Application Scoring
l)  Behavioral Scoring
m)  Credit Rating
n)  Facility Pricing Tool
o)  Derivatives - Options, Futures, Forwards, Swaps, Credit Derivatives

•   Retail Lending
a)  Interest Subsidy Loans

•   Regulatory Compliance
a)  FATCA - Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act

•   Multi-channel Solutioning
a)  Safe Deposit Box
b)  Interactive Voice Response System
c)  Net Budget (Personal Wealth Management Planner)
d)  Teller System
e)  Retail E-banking

•   Training
a)  Underwent intensive training on Agile technology


6.  Infosys Technologies Limited, Bangalore

PositionHistory.Title: Senior Associate Consultant - Finacle
PositionHistory.Description:
(Basel Compliance, Retail Assets, Mortgages, Securitization)

•  Deputed to keep track of various developments in the banking and financial sector.
•  Accountable for interacting with clients and the technical team to incorporate various regulatory
requirements in Finacle, the banking product of Infosys.
•  Spearheading efforts across production support activities and liaising with the technical team for customized
developments; responsible for enhancements within the product.
•  Preparing functional and system requirement specifications for various clients.
•  Responsible for authoring the retail banking newsletter, Retail Tale.
•  Writing articles for the retail banking portal, Retail Bank Quest.
•  Successfully completed functional and technical certifications in e-banking, Oracle, Unix and Retail
Consumer Lending
•  Delivered a presentation on Green IT.
•  Entrusted with the task of keeping track of TCS as a competitor, in the core banking domain, SAP as a competitor, in the microfinance domain and Oracle as a competitor, in the Basel II domain.
On the Job Training:
•  Underwent an intensive training in Finacle for one month
•  Performed testing of fixed tickets, detected bugs and raised new tickets

Authored requirement specifications for the following enhancements in Finacle:

•  Basel II data capture for making Finacle Basel compliant
•  Credit risk - Standardized, Foundation IRB and Advanced IRB approaches
•  Market risk - Standardized and Internal Models Approach
•  VaR calculation - Historical, Variance - Covariance and Monte Carlo Simulation
•  Operational risk - Basic Indicator, Standardized and Advanced Measurement approaches
•  Stress testing, backtesting
•  Reverse Mortgage Origination and Servicing
•  Line of Credit (HELOC, PLOC, RELOC) Origination and Servicing for US and Canada markets
•  Investor Reporting
•  Escrow origination and servicing
•  Rate Lock
•  FASB 91
•  Collateral revaluation and maintenance of collateral history
•  Generation  of  a  quote/key  facts  illustration  from  the  Loan  Origination  System  and  the  Loan  Maintenance
System
•  Integration of Finanz Tools with the Loan Origination System in CRM
•  Dormancy Status for Non-Financial Transactions
•  Changing the behaviour of the menu option, HLACAM, which performs the amortization batch job
•  Validation at the time of rephasement, keeping the EMI fixed and changing the tenor
•  Carryover of charge demands
•  Overflow carryover
•  EMI plus interest on holiday period to be raised as a combined demand at the time of the first instalment
•  Enabling  scheduled  and  unscheduled  loan  repayments  and  loan  disbursement  for  forward  contract
utilization
•  Accepting cheque for scheduled and unscheduled loan repayment and loan payoff
•  Dropping of multiple disbursement parameter
•  Securitization: Pool creation criteria based on geographic location of the mortgaged property
•  Handling of minor's accounts
•  Display of the portion of permitted annual overpayment used in a calendar year
•  Analysis of cross-functional dependency of retail loans module on payment systems
•  Calculation and display of Annual Percentage Rate (APR) as per CCA guideline for UK market
•  Calculation and display of APR for loans having a subsidy amount
•  Minimum balance check for automatic debits

PROJECT
Price Waterhouse Coopers, New York - Onsite project for US market study, gap analysis, business
requirement gathering and developing functional requirement specifications

Authored the following requirement specifications for enhancements in Finacle:

•  Mortgage (including Buydown) Origination and Servicing
•  Investor Reporting
•  Special Products- Adjustable Rate Mortgages (ARMs), Construction loans, Balloon loans
•  Escrow Servicing for Mortgages and Liability accounts
•  Impound Accounts, Buydowns and Buyups
•  Liability (DDA accounts) Origination and Servicing
•  Line Of Credit Origination (HELOC, PLOC, RELOC) and Servicing
•  Personal Line of Credit Origination and Servicing
•  Origination and Servicing of Boat Loans, Personal Loans and Auto Loans
•  General Ledger
•  Basel II Data Capture
•  Minor Accounts

WHITE PAPER
•   Authored a white paper on "Credit Ratings-Empty Rituals"

Degree.Comments:
Post Graduate Diploma in Management, Finance and Marketing - 2008
SDM-IMD, Mysore, CGPA=3.25/4
•  Stood amongst the top 5" students (out of 120 students) of the PGDM Batch 2006-2008 by securing a CGPA of 3.25 on a scale of 4.0
